data.title: Best time to visit Leipzig: Weather and Temperatures. 5 months to avoid! - Germany
data.meta_description: The climate is unfavourable 5 months out of 12 in Leipzig. Don't get there the wrong period! Discover the best time to go to have a perfect weather.
data.text:
Best time to go to Leipzig Average weather of Leipzig, Germany

When is the best time to go to Leipzig?

When is the best time to go to Leipzig? Here's some information to help you in your decision:

The best months for good weather in Leipzig are May, June, July, August and September

On average, the warmest months are June, July and August

January is the coldest month of the year

July is the rainiest month

Annual weather in Leipzig

For full information about the climate and weather in Leipzig a specific month, click on the corresponding line below:

Month Our opinion January -0°C/3°C 53mm very bad weather Leipzig in january February -0°C/5°C 39mm very bad weather Leipzig in february March 3°C/10°C 38mm very bad weather Leipzig in march April 8°C/15°C 32mm tolerable weather Leipzig in april May 12°C/19°C 65mm good weather Leipzig in may June 16°C/23°C 65mm good weather Leipzig in june July 18°C/25°C 82mm good weather Leipzig in july August 18°C/25°C 62mm perfect weather Leipzig in august September 13°C/21°C 54mm good weather Leipzig in september October 8°C/15°C 50mm tolerable weather Leipzig in october November 5°C/10°C 46mm very bad weather Leipzig in november December 2°C/5°C 52mm very bad weather Leipzig in december

Weather and climate in Leipzig

Leipzig enjoys a temperate oceanic climate (with warm summer) in accordance with the Köppen-Geiger classification. The yearly average maximum temperature in Leipzig is 15°C (ranging from 3°C in january to 25°C in august). Annual rainfall is 634mm, with a minimum of 32mm in april and a maximum of 82mm in july.

From january to march the climate is the worst possible. By early evening, the temperature averages 6°C and it rains about 6% of the time in march.

In the month of april the climate is okay. In average, on the morning it is 8°C and you can expect to have 32mm of rainfall/month during this period.

From may to september the climate is beautiful. The temperature rises to 21°C.

In the month of october the climate is correct. The temperature rises to 15°C and it rains about 10% of the time in october.

In november the climate is not good. It is for example 10°C as maximum temperature in november and it rains about 46mm each month.

In december the climate is very bad. The temperature rises to 5°C and, in december, 3 days of rain are expected.

Charts: temperature and rainfall in Leipzig

In the charts below, you can see the following seasonal norms for the city of Leipzig: the minimum and maximum outdoor temperature, the risk and amount of monthly rainfall, daily average sunshine, and relative humidity for each month of the year.

Precipitation (rainfall)

Peak visitor numbers and tourist seasons in Leipzig

Find out when Leipzig has its high tourist season (the period when the influx of tourists is highest) and off-peak tourist season using our data and figures.

Tourist seasons in Leipzig

Very low season in Leipzig

The months with the lowest number of tourists are: January and February.

Low season in Leipzig

The months with low numbers of tourists are: March, April and November.

High season in Leipzig

The number of visitors to Leipzig is high in: May, July, September, October and December.

Peak season in Leipzig

The largest number of tourists visiting Leipzig is during: June and August.

Figure: Visitor index for Leipzig month by month

Best time for low prices in Leipzig

Average prices of hotels in Leipzig month by month

Generally, November is the month with the lowest hotel prices in Leipzig. So this is a great time to save on your holiday! In contrast, April is statistically the most expensive month of the year for hotels.

Find the best price for your hotel room

Average price for flights to Leipzig

A return flight between London and Leipzig is generally cheaper if you go in january ($ 81 on average): this is the best time for travellers on a tight budget. In contrast, you may end up paying $ 178 more for your airline ticket to Leipzig if you go in august.

Find the best price for your flight Flight prices to Leipzig

Average price of hiring a car in Leipzig

On average, it costs $ 43 per day to hire a car in Leipzig. This price varies by $ 3.3 depending on the month. In march, hiring a car costs an average of $ 41 per 24 hours, so this is the best time to save money! In contrast, the average price in october is $ 45.

Find the best price for your car rental
